description.value: Calling upon your birthright as a shobhad, you channel the spirit of your ancestral home world of Akiton to encase you in a forbidding aura that causes your enemies to shy away from you in fear. Clad in the glory of the red planet, none can stand before you! You can cast @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Repulsion] once per day as a primal innate spell. Creatures from Akiton take a â€“2 penalty to their Will saves against this effect.
